Features

Posts

Create unlimited posts to public along with categorized groups. You can add mutiple pictures on the single wall.

as anonymous

Send as anonymous posts for ask questions what's on your mind, without them ever knowing it was you! Because you will be hidden!

Groups

Dont' see unwanted, unlike Posts on your wall. We have categorized the categories as groups, You can unsubscribe unwanted groups from your settings.

Favorites

Like posts or comments and persons! You can only see favorited posts on your wall.
